text: DI PREN covenant INFAN ISRAEL NI raised them 12 patriarchs. Di dir mi est vi long as vi observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat) don obligatory charity (Zakat) kred en My messengers respekt them ad al lend DI prunt righteousness! Mi tiam remit your pek admit vi into gxarden flu streams Anyone disbelieves post this hav ja strayed dekstr path
